name: Leaf Me Read in Peace
description:
You're trying to enjoy reading a book on an autumn afternoon, yet the wind won't stop blowing those pesky leaves onto your lawn. Since leaf monsters come out of too many piled leaves, it's time to grab your trusty rake and show the leaves who's the boss of the lawn.

Overview

Leaf Me Read in Peace is a lawn cleanup game in which you try to read your book in peace, by brewing leaf monsters coffee or by stopping them from spawning in the first place.

Instructions on how to play are included in the game itself.

Made for Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

Credits

  • grizeldi - Project Lead, 2D and 3D art, VFX
  • ImTheRedDevil - Programming
  • aLunarYok - Programming, 2D art
  • Nuttybugs - 3D art, being lost in Unity
  • Sound effects from Soniss GDC Packs
  • Delt06's URP toon shader
